headline: Rockwell Automation Asia Pacific Earns 2025 Great Place To Work Certification™
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation is proud to be Certified™ by Great Place To Work® across Asia and the Pacific in 2025. The prestigious award is based entirely on what current employees say about their experience working at Rockwell Automation. This year, 80% of Rockwell Automation's employees said it's a great place to work.

content.title: Rockwell Automation Asia Pacific Earns 2025 Great Place To Work Certification™

headline: Rockwell Automation (ROK): Valuation Check After $2 Billion Expansion and New NVIDIA-Powered AI Push
summary: Rockwell Automation (ROK) just doubled down on its growth story by unveiling a $2 billion plan for a massive new Wisconsin manufacturing campus while also integrating NVIDIA powered generative AI into its FactoryTalk Design Studio. See our latest analysis for Rockwell Automation. All of this is landing in a stock that already has strong momentum, with a roughly 43% year to date share price return and a 36.9% one year total shareholder return suggesting investors are steadily repricing...

headline: ROCKWELL AUTOMATION LEADS NEW ERA OF MANUFACTURING WITH ELASTIC MES OFFERINGS, UNIFYING OT AND IT ON CLOUD-BASED, RESILIENT PLATFORM
summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced a series of strategic innovations to its Manufacturing Execution System (MES) portfolio, focused on flexibility, scalability and resiliency.

content.title: ROCKWELL AUTOMATION LEADS NEW ERA OF MANUFACTURING WITH ELASTIC MES OFFERINGS, UNIFYING OT AND IT ON CLOUD-BASED, RESILIENT PLATFORM
content.summary: Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced a series of strategic innovations to its Manufacturing Execution System (MES) portfolio, focused on flexibility, scalability and resiliency.

thumbnail.caption: Kristin Fielder, Group Product Manger, Rockwell Automation, presenting Rockwell's MES solutions at the 2025 Plex Summit
